summary.body: Is BA membership on a personal or a per-flat basis? If the latter, is it possible to get extra membership cards issued so that e.g. my wife (who has a different surname to me) doesn't try and persuade the dentist that she's me to get her discount?
summary.subject: BA membership

summary.body: anyone else notice that 02 lift in ben jonson needs just a splash of paint to get rid of the graffiti? its all begining to look a lttle tatty and it shouldn't
summary.subject: service charges, somerfield, and a splash of paint

summary.body: there are bags of original white tiles at 03 Willoughby Car park  which have been dumped. I also saw a completed kitchen lying on Golden Lane by the car park entrance yesterday. I don't understand why the estates office can't  put aside a store to keep some of these pieces for those trying to restore their interiors.
summary.subject: white bathroom tiles dumped in willoughby car park

summary.body: I have signs of water leaking in to my ceiling, but the people upstairs say they can't find any problem? Any suggestions as to what I do now? If water is coming in through upstair flat's window frames, is it the Corporation's problem? Anyone know? Advice welcomed, thanks
summary.subject: water leak

summary.body: Does anyone have any details please?  Is there a talk and presentation - in which case there is no point going except from the start at 6 p.m., or is it an open exhibition with people around to answer questions?
summary.subject: Tonight's meeting (20/09) about Milton Court
